articles.title: How 'Premier League' Galatasaray can derail Man City
articles.summary: Needing a positive result to keep their Champions League campaign on track, Galatasaray are not the side Manchester City would choose to face in their final game of the league phase.

articles.summary: PSG sign 18-year-old Barcelona midfielder Dro Fernandez, with the Spanish side's president calling the situation around the transfer "unpleasant".

articles.title: Why do Premier League teams spend less in January?
articles.summary: BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team looks at why clubs spend significantly more on new signings in the summer than they do in the January transfer window.

articles.title: Bove 'not scared' to return at Watford after cardiac arrest

articles.title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
articles.summary: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?

articles.title: Barry goal rescues draw for Everton against Leeds
articles.summary: Watch Premier League highlights as Everton's Thierno Barry continues his good run of form with a second-half goal to earn the Toffees a 1-1 draw with Leeds United.

articles.title: Leeds have good momentum right now - Farke
articles.summary: Leeds United manager Daniel Farke believes his side's 1-1 draw at Everton is another "good result" and another example of their improved form, having lost only once in the past 11 matches.

articles.title: How 'superb' Fernandes led Man Utd to win at Arsenal
articles.summary: Match of the Day pundit Danny Murphy discusses the "brilliant" role of Bruno Fernandes in Manchester United's dramatic 3-2 win over Arsenal in the Premier League.

articles.title: 'Football doesn't need to take lives' - McQueen daughters on inquest
